title: Simpson Strong Tie MTS12 16-Gauge 12 in. Medium Twist Strap 100-per box
features: Twist straps provide a tension connection between two wood members
Resist uplift at the heel of a truss economically
The 3" bend section eliminates interference at the transition points between wood members
Galvanized for extra corrosion resistance, Made in USA
description: Simpson strong-tie straps and plates join and reinforce joints with simple, versatile solutions for a wide range of connections. Available in many lengths, widths and thicknesses, straps can be used on the wide or narrow face of lumber for light repairs or heavy-duty projects. Many straps are designed to be used back-to-back on a piece of lumber without fastener interference. 12 in. Length install with 10D common nails, 10D x 1-1/2 in. Nails or #9 x 1-1/2 in. Strong-drive sd screws.
